attributes.action: Stop holiday prices increasing during UK School holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Here is an example for Butlins: Same location just a different date: 

Static caravan for a family of 4 = £200 for 4 nights - Week of 11th March
Static caravan for a family of 4 = £400 for 4 nights  - Week of 19th April

How is this fair ? - I might as well pay a fine it will be a lot cheaper and this is the behaviours the Government are driving.
attributes.background: Currently during the school public holidays the prices of holidays both in the UK and abroad increase due to demand.  Parents ca not afford this and they take this risk of a fine where the prices decrease outside the public holiday periods. The Government need to take some action to stop it.
